title: Creative Mathematical Problem-Solving Enhancement Program Using the PENTI Learning Model in [Large-Scale] Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental mathematics concepts (functions, geometry, statistics) and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Collaboration tool usage via smartphones and execution of field-immersive projects

learning_goals: Enhances creative thinking skills to transform real-life problems into mathematical modeling
Develops the ability to generate and evaluate diverse solution strategies through collaboration

Learners can complete at least two of three middle school level 1 math problem-solving tasks provided in offline mode using GeoGebra or Photomath apps within a week, submit a project report including step-by-step solutions, and score at least 3 points (out of 5) in three of four instructor evaluation criteria.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
